post_title: WTB T206s with borders trimmed off
post_content:
Does anyone have (and would part with) some trimmed T206s? There were several lots sold on eBay, but I'm interested in any trimmed or "A" cards.
Thank you!

Bump for this, does anyone have HOFers trimmed to the edges like these?

Thank you!
Jason

I got some really great responses and cards from this, just wanted to throw out one more bump for any trimmed or "A" T206s.

Thank you!

I've had some great luck finding these cards from people on the board, but I'm still looking for a few key HOFers. Please let me know if you have any.
Thanks!
